{"context": " More than 1 year has passed since last update.macro more-labels (&KEY) DEFINITIONS &BODY BODY\nlabels \u306e\u9032\u5316\u7248\u3002DEFINITIONS `more-labels (&KEY) DEFINITIONS &BODY BODY`\n\n    labels \u306e\u9032\u5316\u7248\u3002DEFINITIONS
